body_html:
• Yes, I grabbed them from Tensorboard.
  • I had 5 workers, and when it happened one of them failed due to out of memory error.
  • No that is not expected, the dives happen when the failure happens, i.e. when one of the workers stops working.
  • I will try to create a small repro script asap.
body_text:
Yes, I grabbed them from Tensorboard.
I had 5 workers, and when it happened one of them failed due to out of memory error.
No that is not expected, the dives happen when the failure happens, i.e. when one of the workers stops working.
I will try to create a small repro script asap.
body:
* Yes, I grabbed them from Tensorboard.
* I had 5 workers, and when it happened one of them failed due to out of memory error.
* No that is not expected, the dives happen when the failure happens, i.e. when one of the workers stops working.
* I will try to create a small repro script asap.
